title: Slow motion  after ivern slow
body: So everyhting has been going in slow motion after being hit by an ivern slow, is anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Hey there,

When you say everything is going "slow motion" do you mean you're experiencing drops in your framerate?

Have you attempted [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), sometimes framerate dips can be caused by corrupt assets being displayed?

If the above doesn't help, have you considered that your PC may not be able to run the game efficiently at the settings you've selected? Try lowering your graphics settings, see if this helps.

Nah its not that, it was legitimately making every thing slow down, nothign to do with framrate (was sitting at 120). It was jsut after the first ivern slow that hit me that game, from his shield, our trist got it too, we had to reload into the game to fix it.
